description: Bradford come from behind against Chesterfield to make it back-to-back wins in League Two
title: Bradford come from behind against Chesterfield to make it back-to-back wins in League Two
title_page: Bradford come from behind against Chesterfield to make it back-to-back wins in League Two - BBC Sport
maintext:
Bradford City have won each of their last four Football League games against Chesterfield, keeping a clean sheet in each of those matches in the process.
Chesterfield have lost on each of their last two Football League trips to Bradford, with this their first such visit since a 2-0 loss in January 2017.
Bradford are unbeaten in their final league game of the year in each of the last eight years (W4 D4), keeping a clean sheet in five of the last six years.
Chesterfield have drawn six of their last seven final Football League games of the year (L1), whilst theyâ€™ve scored just one goal in total across their last four such matches.
